tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: interesting change from just BC forestry but hard to pay attention for 3 hrs w 1 break. seems to know what he\'s talking about, and is a privilege to be taught by the dean but I usually get to know my prof a lot more in a 4th yr class than I knew him. Attendance isn\'t mandatory except for the 2 quizzes worth 5% each. class average 78%

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Great, fun. Feels like seminars. Great accent

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: He\'s one of the most experienced people in his field, with the IPCC when they won they Nobel Prize, etc. He comes across nice and straightforward. Probably can\'t get a hold of him outside of class, because he\'s the Dean... The class is easy and very interesting topic - what\'s happening to the world\'s forests, each week a diff part of the world.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Very up-to-date. Covers a range of different subjects - very interesting. Very knowledgeable prof.

tag_professor: Inspirational (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Respected (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: take it!He\'s extremely knowledgeable and his slides are current and packed with resources for further reading!His pictures are great and you learn so much about forestry in other places of the world(refreshing after some BC overload from other courses).Final grade based on assignments(v. interesting!),quizzes and1term paper.sucks class is from5-7.

comments: This is a management class and he goes on and on giving environmental statistics. He is an extremely tough marker.
